newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIA AGRO-FOOD PRICES 0.2 PCT DOWN IN SEPT.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIA AGRO-FOOD PRICES 0.2 PCT DOWN IN SEPT.

text.p: The average prices of the main agro-food products sold at Romanian marketplaces went down by 0.2 percent in September after August's 25.3 percent fall, National Statistics Board data showed on Tuesday.
It said prices of vegetable products -- grains and flour, potatos, fruit -- dropped by 1.9 percent in September.

Prices of animal products -- slaughtered meat, animal fats, milk and dairy products -- rose by 5.6 percent last month, when live animals and poultry prices saw a 9.0 percent increase from the previous month. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
